extension.valueString: This value set is created solely to support early FHIR HAPI server requirements to have all members of a value set in the compose. Because of this, the member list is a point in time snapshot of the content. The value set resource with the compose element to be used in up-to-date systems is identified in the athoritativeSource extension.

name: cdc_malignant_cancer_conditions
title: CDC malignant cancer conditions
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
description: All neoplastic and malignant conditions, including Neoplasm related pain.
purpose: Cancer conditions to be used as an exclusion for opioid management review

extension.valueString: All neoplastic and malignant conditions, including Neoplasm related pain
All C and D codes and G893 Neoplasm related pain (acute) (chronic)
All D50-D89 codes, D3A-D3A and descendants.
